books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The arrival of a mysterious young woman in a small North Carolina town raises questions about her past.
books.name: SAFE HAVEN

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: An investigator probing the disappearance of a seemingly perfect Boston family must dig beneath the surface.
books.name: TOUCH AND GO

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Gabe Hamilton, a wealthy hotel owner, and Mia Crestwell, the much younger sister of his best friend, embark on a passionate, obsessive relationship.
books.name: RUSH

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: A superstar agent at the German headquarters of a powerful investigation firm disappears.
books.name: PRIVATE BERLIN

books.author: by Matthew Quick
books.description: A man recently released from a mental institution has two obsessions: his estranged wife and the Philadelphia Eagles. The basis of the movie; originally published in 2009.
books.name: THE SILVER LININGS PLAYBOOK

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by Robert Crais
books.description: A Los Angeles policeman and a German shepherd, both suffering from PTSD, search for the killers of the cop’s partner.
books.name: SUSPECT

books.author: by A. L. Jackson
books.description: Christian Davison and Elizabeth Ayers meet and fall in love; a prequel to “Take This Regret.”
books.name: LOST TO YOU

books.author: by Lisa Kleypas
books.description: Justine Hoffman, the proprietor of a hotel on the island of Friday Harbor, finally finds love — with a dangerous and mysterious man.
books.name: CRYSTAL COVE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The stories of two relationships, at different times, intersect unexpectedly.
books.name: UNTIL THE END OF TIME

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: The man who has been relentlessly pursuing Sky Davis is not who he pretends to be.
books.name: HOPELESS

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The military investigator John Puller probes his aunt’s mysterious death in Florida.
books.name: THE FORGOTTEN
